summary: A teenage girl is given the martial arts skills of The White Dragon. When she discovers that the famed assassin, Chicken Feathers, is planning to kill her beloved prince, she seeks to prevent him.
cast: Francis Ng|Andy On|Lei Liu|Cecilia Cheung|Xiaolong Ding|Avi K. Garg|Shiu Hung Hui|Zhangjin Shi|Nei Suet|Patrick Tang|Kitty Yuen
title: Dragón blanco
